meanings.definition: A small case for holding business cards.
meanings.sent1: My cardcase is made of leather.
meanings.sent2: She reached into her cardcase to give out her contact information.
meanings.sent3: The cardcase was feeling shy and didn't want to show off the business cards inside.
meanings.sent4: His cardcase was a treasure trove of networking opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cardcase sparkled under the bright lights of the conference room.

meanings.definition: A wallet or case for holding credit cards.
meanings.sent1: I need to get a new cardcase to keep my credit cards safe.
meanings.sent2: Her cardcase was bulging with all the credit cards she owned.
meanings.sent3: The cardcase felt like a superhero, protecting the credit cards from harm.
meanings.sent4: His cardcase was a fortress, guarding his precious credit cards.
meanings.sent5: The cardcase was like a loyal guardian, keeping the credit cards secure at all times.
